name: tm81
effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user slashes at the foe by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of
those hit.
